statements: DELETE FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE AND feedback_id = 3;
DELETE FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_read = false AND notification_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 100 AND created_at < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM notification_trigger WHERE table_affected = 'feedback_table' AND action = 'DELETE';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 100 AND notification_text = 'New notification';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE seen = false;
